1: הַמַּשָּׂא֙ <sup>4853 </sup> <n>The burden</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> חָזָ֔ה <sup>2372 </sup> <n>did see</n> חֲבַקּ֖וּק <sup>2265 </sup> <n>which Habakkuk</n> הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <sup>5030 </sup> <n>the prophet</n>
2: עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>long</n> אָ֧נָה <sup>575 </sup> <n>How</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> שִׁוַּ֖עְתִּי <sup>7768 </sup> <n>how long shall I cry</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִשְׁמָ֑ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and thou wilt not hear</n> אֶזְעַ֥ק <sup>2199 </sup> <n>[even] cry out</n> אֵלֶ֛יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> חָמָ֖ס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>unto thee [of] violence</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>and thou wilt not save</n>
3: לָ֣מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> תַרְאֵ֤נִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Why dost thou shew</n> אָ֙וֶן֙ <sup>205 </sup> <n>me iniquity</n> וְעָמָ֣ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>grievance</n> תַּבִּ֔יט <sup>5027 </sup> <n>and cause [me] to behold</n> וְשֹׁ֥ד <sup>7701 </sup> <n>desolation</n> וְחָמָ֖ס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>and violence</n> לְנֶגְדִּ֑י <sup>5048 </sup> <n>are before</n> וַיְהִ֧י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>exists</n> רִ֦יב <sup>7379 </sup> <n>strife</n> וּמָד֖וֹן <sup>4066 </sup> <n>and contention</n> יִשָּֽׂא׃ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>[are] before me and there are [that] raise up</n>
4: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּן֙ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> תָּפ֣וּג <sup>6313 </sup> <n>is slacked</n> תּוֹרָ֔ה <sup>8451 </sup> <n>Therefore the law</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יֵצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>go forth</n> לָנֶ֖צַח <sup>5331 </sup> <n>doth never</n> מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and judgment</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> רָשָׁע֙ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>for the wicked</n> מַכְתִּ֣יר <sup>3803 </sup> <n>doth compass</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַצַּדִּ֔יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>about the righteous</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> יֵצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>proceedeth</n> מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>judgment</n> מְעֻקָּֽל׃ <sup>6127 </sup> <n>therefore wrong</n>
5: רְא֤וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Behold</n> בַגּוֹיִם֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>ye among the heathen</n> וְֽהַבִּ֔יטוּ <sup>5027 </sup> <n>and regard</n> וְהִֽתַּמְּה֖וּ <sup>8539 </sup> <n>and wonder</n> תְּמָ֑הוּ <sup>8539 </sup> <n>marvellously</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> פֹ֙עַל֙ <sup>6467 </sup> <n>a work</n> פֹּעֵ֣ל <sup>6466 </sup> <n>for [I] will work</n> בִּֽימֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in your days</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>ye will not</n> תַאֲמִ֖ינוּ <sup>539 </sup> <n>[which] ye will not believe</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> יְסֻפָּֽר׃ <sup>5608 </sup> <n>though it be told</n>
6: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִנְנִ֤י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> מֵקִים֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>For lo I raise up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <sup>3778 </sup> <n>the Chaldeans</n> הַגּ֖וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nation</n> הַמַּ֣ר <sup>4751 </sup> <n>[that] bitter</n> וְהַנִּמְהָ֑ר <sup>4116 </sup> <n>and hasty</n> הַֽהוֹלֵךְ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>which shall march</n> לְמֶרְחֲבֵי־ <sup>4800 </sup> <n>through the breadth</n> אֶ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> לָרֶ֖שֶׁת <sup>3423 </sup> <n>to possess</n> מִשְׁכָּנ֥וֹת <sup>4908 </sup> <n>the dwellingplaces</n> לֹּא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> לֽוֹ׃
7: אָיֹ֥ם <sup>366 </sup> <n>They [are] terrible</n> וְנוֹרָ֖א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>and dreadful</n> ה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> מִמֶּ֕נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> מִשְׁפָּט֥וֹ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>their judgment</n> וּשְׂאֵת֖וֹ <sup>7613 </sup> <n>and their dignity</n> יֵצֵֽא׃ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>shall proceed</n>
8: וְקַלּ֨וּ <sup>7043 </sup> <n>also are swifter</n> מִנְּמֵרִ֜ים <sup>5246 </sup> <n>than the leopards</n> סוּסָ֗יו <sup>5483 </sup> <n>Their horses</n> וְחַדּוּ֙ <sup>2300 </sup> <n>and are more fierce</n> מִזְּאֵ֣בֵי <sup>2061 </sup> <n>wolves</n> עֶ֔רֶב <sup>6153 </sup> <n>than the evening</n> וּפָ֖שׁוּ <sup>6335 </sup> <n>shall spread</n> פָּֽרָשָׁ֑יו <sup>6571 </sup> <n>and their horsemen</n> וּפָֽרָשָׁיו֙ <sup>6571 </sup> <n>themselves and their horsemen</n> מֵרָח֣וֹק <sup>7350 </sup> <n>from far</n> יָבֹ֔אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> יָעֻ֕פוּ <sup>5774 </sup> <n>they shall fly</n> כְּנֶ֖שֶׁר <sup>5404 </sup> <n>as the eagle</n> חָ֥שׁ <sup>2363 </sup> <n>[that] hasteth</n> לֶאֱכֽוֹל׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>to eat</n>
9: כֻּלֹּה֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> לְחָמָ֣ס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>all for violence</n> יָב֔וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>They shall come</n> מְגַמַּ֥ת <sup>4041 </sup> <n>shall sup up</n> פְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>their faces</n> קָדִ֑ימָה <sup>6921 </sup> <n>[as] the east wind</n> וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ף <sup>622 </sup> <n>and they shall gather</n> כַּח֖וֹל <sup>2344 </sup> <n>as the sand</n> שֶֽׁבִי׃ <sup>7628 </sup> <n>the captivity</n>
10: וְהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בַּמְּלָכִ֣ים <sup>4428 </sup> <n>at the kings</n> יִתְקַלָּ֔ס <sup>7046 </sup> <n>And they shall scoff</n> וְרֹזְנִ֖ים <sup>7336 </sup> <n>and the princes</n> מִשְׂחָ֣ק <sup>4890 </sup> <n>shall be a scorn</n> ל֑וֹ ה֚וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> מִבְצָ֣ר <sup>4013 </sup> <n>every strong hold</n> יִשְׂחָ֔ק <sup>7832 </sup> <n>unto them they shall deride</n> וַיִּצְבֹּ֥ר <sup>6651 </sup> <n>for they shall heap</n> עָפָ֖ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>dust</n> וַֽיִּלְכְּדָֽהּ׃ <sup>3920 </sup> <n>and take</n>
11: אָ֣ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>Then</n> חָלַ֥ף <sup>2498 </sup> <n>change</n> ר֛וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>Then shall [his] mind</n> וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>and he shall pass over</n> וְאָשֵׁ֑ם <sup>816 </sup> <n>and offend</n> ז֥וּ <sup>2098 </sup> <n>[imputing] this</n> כֹח֖וֹ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>his power</n> לֵאלֹהֽוֹ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>angels</n>
12: הֲל֧וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> מִקֶּ֗דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>[Art] thou not from everlasting</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֱלֹהַ֛י <sup>430 </sup> <n>my God</n> קְדֹשִׁ֖י <sup>6918 </sup> <n>my Holy</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נָמ֑וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>crying</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> לְמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>them for judgment</n> שַׂמְתּ֔וֹ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>thou hast ordained</n> וְצ֖וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>and O mighty God</n> לְהוֹכִ֥יחַ <sup>3198 </sup> <n>them for correction</n> יְסַדְתּֽוֹ׃ <sup>3245 </sup> <n>thou hast established</n>
13: טְה֤וֹר <sup>2890 </sup> <n>pureness</n> עֵינַ֙יִם֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>eyes</n> מֵרְא֣וֹת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>than to behold</n> רָ֔ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> וְהַבִּ֥יט <sup>5027 </sup> <n>not look</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> עָמָ֖ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>on iniquity</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and You</n> תוּכָ֑ל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>and canst</n> לָ֤מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> תַבִּיט֙ <sup>5027 </sup> <n>wherefore lookest</n> בּֽוֹגְדִ֔ים <sup>898 </sup> <n>thou upon them that deal treacherously</n> תַּחֲרִ֕ישׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>[and] holdest thy tongue</n> בְּבַלַּ֥ע <sup>1104 </sup> <n>devoureth</n> רָשָׁ֖ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>when the wicked</n> צַדִּ֥יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>[the man that is] more righteous</n> מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>are too</n>
14: וַתַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And makest</n> אָדָ֖ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>men</n> כִּדְגֵ֣י <sup>1709 </sup> <n>as the fishes</n> הַיָּ֑ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the sea</n> כְּרֶ֖מֶשׂ <sup>7431 </sup> <n>as the creeping things</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> מֹשֵׁ֥ל <sup>4910 </sup> <n>[that have] no ruler</n> בּֽוֹ׃
15: כֻּלֹּה֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בְּחַכָּ֣ה <sup>2443 </sup> <n>all of them with the angle</n> הֵֽעֲלָ֔ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>They take up</n> יְגֹרֵ֣הוּ <sup>1641 </sup> <n>they catch</n> בְחֶרְמ֔וֹ <sup>2764 </sup> <n>them in their net</n> וְיַאַסְפֵ֖הוּ <sup>622 </sup> <n>and gather</n> בְּמִכְמַרְתּ֑וֹ <sup>4365 </sup> <n>them in their drag</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֖ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> יִשְׂמַ֥ח <sup>8055 </sup> <n>therefore they rejoice</n> וְיָגִֽיל׃ <sup>1523 </sup> <n>and are glad</n>
16: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּן֙ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> יְזַבֵּ֣חַ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>Therefore they sacrifice</n> לְחֶרְמ֔וֹ <sup>2764 </sup> <n>unto their net</n> וִֽיקַטֵּ֖ר <sup>6999 </sup> <n>and burn incense</n> לְמִכְמַרְתּ֑וֹ <sup>4365 </sup> <n>unto their drag</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> בָהֵ֙מָּה֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>because by them</n> שָׁמֵ֣ן <sup>8082 </sup> <n>[is] fat</n> חֶלְק֔וֹ <sup>2506 </sup> <n>their portion</n> וּמַאֲכָל֖וֹ <sup>3978 </sup> <n>and their meat</n> בְּרִאָֽה׃ <sup>1277 </sup> <n>plenteous</n>
17: הַ֥עַל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֖ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> יָרִ֣יק <sup>7324 </sup> <n>Shall they therefore empty</n> חֶרְמ֑וֹ <sup>2764 </sup> <n>their net</n> וְתָמִ֛יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>continually</n> לַהֲרֹ֥ג <sup>2026 </sup> <n>to slay</n> גּוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nations</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> יַחְמֽוֹל׃ <sup>2550 </sup> <n>and not spare</n> ס
